p: Historical climate data were downloaded from the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) Data Distribution Centre (DDC) and were manipulated using ArcGIS ® (V 10.2) software by Esri to create decadal layers of nontransformed (true‐value) climate variables (Mitchell, Carter, Jones, Hulme, & New, 2004; Mitchell & Jones, 2005). Our climate dataset consists of mean temperature, precipitation, and number of frost‐free days (FFD) for each decade of the time period 1901–1960 or 1961–2000, at five arc‐minute resolution.
